Dear HostedTalk Community,

We are happy to announce brand new dedicated servers plans hosted in our Malta Data Center starting from €80 per month!

About Us
NetShop ISP is established in 2004 offering Dedicated Servers, Cloud & VPS, Colocation Hosting, SSL Certificates and Domain Names. The offered Data Center locations are: Cyprus, Malta, United Kingdom, Netherlands, United States (Los Angeles), Singapore and Hong Kong.

https://netshop-isp.com.cy
Email: sales@netshop-isp.com.cy

MT-R32-S401
